entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or freezing rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:47 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:47 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening. Flurries beginning in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:47 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
